item.title: About
item.description: I’m Ryan Barkley, a full-stack software developer currently based in the Evansville, IN area. Like many, I started making websites in my early teens partially for fun and partially just to see if I could. Eventually I figured out people would pay me money for that sort of thing so I continued through high school and college. After graduation, I pursued freelancing full-time for a few years before eventually starting a new role at a growing regional fiber ISP.

item.title: Personal Digital Security
item.description: While it is impossible to eliminate 100% of risk, there are a few (relatively) simple things you can do to reduce your risk in a meaningful way and help limit the blast radius if your password is compromised.
